NAME: dbclient
COMMENTS: SSH Client - minimalist version of dropbear without server functionality.

NAME: kilo
COMMENTS: A minimalist text editor without any dependencies.

NAME: linux
COMMENTS: The Linux Kernel

NAME: musl
COMMENTS: musl is the C-library which OS/1337 is compiled against. All binaries are to be statically linked against musl. The releases linked are the musl-cross packages that should be used.

NAME: toybox
COMMENTS: Toybox is the Userland for OS/1337

NAME: btop
COMMENTS: btop is a resource monitor that unites multiple tools like top and htop in one. It requires at least an 80x24 console to run and display anything.

NAME: calc
COMMENTS: calc is a CLI-based calculator supporting arbitrary precision.

NAME: cramfs-tools
COMMENTS: Allows for generating and editing CramFS images, wich is a read-only (ROM) compressed filesystem that is intended to be loaded into RAM.

NAME: curl
COMMENTS: curl is a flexible uploader and downloader for files.

NAME: curl-tiny
COMMENTS: A minimalist Version of curl that does HTTP(S) GET only. Requires way less resources to run.

NAME: demo.app
COMMENTS: demo entry to verify that spm works. It should spit out hello world when launching.

NAME: dropbear
COMMENTS: SSH Server & Client - full package.

NAME: enc
COMMENTS: A modern and easy to use replacement for GnuPG & OpenPGP.

NAME: fish
COMMENTS: The Friendly Interactive Shell

NAME: git
COMMENTS: A flexible sourcecode management to handle both distributed teams and intelligent source code managment.

NAME: lynx
COMMENTS: lynx is a CLI-based webbrowser

NAME: mc
COMMENTS: midnight commander is a TUI-based file manager inspired by Norton Commander.

NAME: ne
COMMENTS: ne, the nice editor - a simple text editor

NAME: neofetch
COMMENTS: A System Infromation Screen, written in bash

NAME: neomutt
COMMENTS: neomutt is a fork of mutt, a classic yet powerful TUI-based eMail client.

NAME: rsync
COMMENTS: A versatile file copying tool that can be used for backup & restore in a push/pull configuration.

NAME: spm
COMMENTS: The package manager for OS/1337.

NAME: squashfs-tools
COMMENTS: Tools to generate and extract SquashFS images, a compressed, readonly filesystem used for RAM-disks. It's more powerful but also more resource-hungry than CramFS.

NAME: tmux
COMMENTS: tmux is a terminal multiplexer that allows to attach and detach sessions.

NAME: util-linux
COMMENTS: Various Utilities for Linux. Includes useful commands like cfdisk,

NAME: aerc
COMMENTS: aerc is a minimalist CLI eMail client

NAME: aria2
COMMENTS: A multi-protocol Downloader supporting BitTorrent and other protocols.

NAME: ash
COMMENTS: A simple and clean CLI Text Editor.

NAME: bat
COMMENTS: A cat(1) clone with wings. Can also be used as a better version of tail.

NAME: browsh
COMMENTS: A low-bandwith Browser using SSH tunnels.

NAME: cups
COMMENTS: The Comon Unix Printing System (cups) is the standard for handling print jobs among UNIX-esque systems.

NAME: duplicity
COMMENTS: A Backup tool that uses lirsync and supports encrypting backups.

NAME: fd
COMMENTS: A simple, fast and user-friendly alternative to 'find'.

NAME: fzf
COMMENTS: A command line fuzzy finder.

NAME: helix
COMMENTS: A post-modern modal text editor written in Rust.

NAME: irssi
COMMENTS: A TUI-based IRC Client.

NAME: kakoune
COMMENTS: A vi-style model editor with some nifty tricks.

NAME: micro
COMMENTS: A modern and intuitive terminal-based text editor, not dissimilar from nano.

NAME: mkp224o
COMMENTS: vanity address generator for tor onion v3 (ed25519) OnionServices.

NAME: mle
COMMENTS: A flexible terminal-based text editor written in C

NAME: monero
COMMENTS: Monero CLI Wallet / Node / Client.

NAME: mosh
COMMENTS: mobile shell is an alternative to SSH that is tolerant to unstable connections and changing IP addresses. It's able to automatically resume sessions.

NAME: neovim
COMMENTS: neovim is a versatile and extremely powerful editor for professional users, it is based upon vim which is based upon vi.

NAME: nvchad
COMMENTS: NvChad is a neovim-configuration, requires neovim.

NAME: ntfy
COMMENTS: ntfy is a notification server that allows forwarding notifications to mobile devices from the command line.

NAME: nyx
COMMENTS: nyx is a bandwith graph & configuration tool for tor. It requires Python 2.7+ and Stem 1.5.4+ as well as tor.

NAME: ohmyzsh
COMMENTS: zsh configuration manager, requires zsh.

NAME: oshi
COMMENTS: A Filehosting & -Sharing Server written in Perl. Supports up- and downloads via curl. Reference Instance can be found at oshi.at.

NAME: pass
COMMENTS: pass is a password and credentials manager that utilizes GnuPG-encrypted files to store the credentials and can be used with git and rsync to version and sync them.

NAME: pipewire
COMMENTS: PipeWire is the new multimedia framework to handle audio and video playback and recording on Linux. It replaces, ALSA, OSS, PulseAudio, Jack & Gstreamer.

NAME: profanity-im
COMMENTS: A TUI based XMPP client.

NAME: proxychains-ng
COMMENTS: proxychains ng (new generation) - a preloader which hooks calls to sockets in dynamically linked programs and redirects it through one or more socks/http proxies.

NAME: pwnat
COMMENTS: The only tool/technique to punch holes through firewalls/NATs where multiple clients & server can be behind separate NATs without any 3rd party involvement. It uses ICMP packets to circumvent firewalls and create UDP tunnels.

NAME: rclone
COMMENTS: A sync utility that allows syncing files rsync-style to high-latency storage like webhosters.

NAME: rdiff-backup
COMMENTS: A Backup Software that uses *reverse deltas* to offer a consistent backup. Requires Python.

NAME: systemd
COMMENTS: SystemD is a suite of servers that manage various functions. It is more than a mere `init' system.

NAME: tilde
COMMENTS: A TUI-based text editor with an ncurses UI.https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/pipewire/pipewire/-/releases

NAME: tiv
COMMENTS: Small C++ program to display images in a (modern) terminal using RGB ANSI codes and unicode block graphics characters.

NAME: tor
COMMENTS: Tor is an anonymization solution using onion routing.

NAME: tym
COMMENTS: Time rsYnc Machine, a backup utility with the approach popularized by the Time Machine of Apple.

NAME: ventoy
COMMENTS: Ventoy is a CLI tool to install a Plug & Play configuration of ISOLINUX. It's mostly useful to prepare (USB-)Multiboot devices.

NAME: weechat
COMMENTS: A modular, extensible Chat client for the terminal with IRC support built-in. Not to be confused wit WeChat!!!

NAME: wipe
COMMENTS: A data erasure tool that overwrites storage media.

NAME: wwiv
COMMENTS: A BBS Server.

NAME: xmrig
COMMENTS: Monero Miner

NAME: yazi
COMMENTS: Blazing fast terminal file manager written in Rust, based on async I/O.

NAME: ytdlp
COMMENTS: A downloader for online videos. Supports various platforms.

NAME: zoxide
COMMENTS: A smarter cd command. Supports all major shells.

NAME: zsh
COMMENTS: A classic Unix shell

NAME: zulip-term
COMMENTS: A TUI-based Client for Zulip Chat. Requires Python.
